title: Can we add a report option when in game lobby esp for ranked?
body: It's annoying how in dynamic queue you get your primary/secondary role and the others just take your role anyway? "goingmid fuck off". Rito can you do something about this?

replies.body: I'm under the impression that the pre-game logs are recorded and players taking other roles without the other player agreeing with it is a bannable offence. So I would still report them after the game, but I agree that it is very frustrating!

i think getting placed with the 4 man premade with the club tag "Sluts" that all pick troll champs such as Udyr support, Irelia mid, Aatrox adc etc all 4 of them run  ghost/cleanse including the Jungler and  are just going to run down mid so they can get to bronze 5 are more worthy of a report during lobby function. one shouldn't have to lost a game to report that, nor should someone have to suffer for dodging that...

This is definitely an issue ATM. The thing is that you start to run into limits with the report system itself.

Currently the fastest report system we have is the [Instant Feedback system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-), but even that takes 15 minutes to properly review each case. Ranked champion select only takes around 4 minutes, so as you can imagine there might be some concerns with time limits. There's obviously other issues as well, like the system being abused... etc.

I'm not saying we should throw in towel and hand this one over to the trolls, there's some very smart engineers at **Riot** who can probably find a decent solution to champion select reporting. But it's important to acknowledge that this issue doesn't have a clear cut and easy solution.
